thread.title: Resort and Cruise News: Tennis With Connors; Trips in Alaska
thread.title_full: Resort and Cruise News: Tennis With Connors; Trips in Alaska - The New York Times

author: Elaine Glusac
title: Resort and Cruise News: Tennis With Connors; Trips in Alaska
text:
Our morning travel news digest, with deals, tips and anything else that travelers may want to know.
MATCHING UP WITH JIMMY CONNORS
For fans with raging U.S. Open fever, the Boca Raton Resort & Club , a Waldorf Astoria Resort, in Florida is offering a high-priced cure: some on-court pointers with the tennis legend Jimmy Connors. The new “Legends of Boca Experience” package allows guests to book a half day with Mr. Connors for a private tennis lesson or a round of golf plus lunch during a three-night stay. Extras include a sunset cruise, couples massage, a beach cabana and nightly dinners. Potential players can book the package anytime subject only to syncing schedules with Mr. Connors, who lives in the area. Celebrity coaches, however, don’t come cheap. The deal costs $20,000 for two.
NEW SMALL SHIP SAILINGS IN ALASKA
